mainText:
One of my goals in life was to meet Steve Jobs in person and learn about 
his vision and great achievements. Unfortunately that goal cannot be 
completed now because of his passing. He was a great visionary, 
inspirational figure, and a great CEO. I actually think he did make a 
dent in the Universe with bringing his intelligent ideas to life. I can 
say that another goal I had was to be hired by Apple and fortunately 
that has been accomplished recently. It was great working for Steve 
Jobs. He will never be forgotten. I will always miss and remember him. 
One day, when it's my time, I will hopefully be able to meet this man in 
the next life.
author: Jason
